1.caption_en:
A bold typographic poster reads, "We asked ourself: When platforms are so powerful, how can we utilize them to create a positive impact?" It uses large white text on a dark slate background with a teal rectangular highlight behind the top header.

  "language": "English",
  "full_text_transcription": "We asked ourself:\n\nWhen platforms are so powerful,\nhow can we utilize them to create a\npositive impact?",
